name: Sky Chasers (itch)
description:
Fly a hovercraft among wild beasts in Sky Chasers! This retro adventure game lets you pilot the Armada, Golden Beetle, and Pioneer. After gliding through coins, you can land on a computer pod to store your gold and recharge your battery!

This is the official web version of the award winning app from Lucky Kat Studios. The Sky Chasers web version features the same easy-to-play two touch controls and hours of game play as the mobile game. Explore the world with unique enemies, puzzles and challenges.

Turn up your speakers and enjoy the retro inspired music by Maxo. Play this game in your browser and prove to your friends you are a true Sky Chaser!
